DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study explore effectiveness 3D print small pulmonary nodule localization design assist device facilitate localization procedure .
DOC.brief_title: Application 3D Printing Technique Small Pulmonary Nodule Localization
DOC.detailed_description: Patient recruitment : The chest CT review two experienced doctor determine whether patient suitable localization . data collection management : The data collect reviewed specialized researcher reduce heterogenicity . The following data collect : age , sex , nodule size , location , density , distance pleura , radiation dose , localization time , complication pathologic result . data analysis : statistical analysis perform SPSS 22.0 . Fisher exact test use comparison two group . Mann-Whitney U test use numeric variable . P < 0.05 consider significant .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Aged 19 80 year 2. lesion locate peripheral lung tissue remove wedge resection 3 . The maximum diameter lesion 20mm 4 . Examination show metastasis ; 5.Informed consent sign voluntarily . 1. lesion locate scapula covered area 2. patient could cooperate process .
